item.title: 2025-08-05 ‚Äì CNC Related
item.description:
A quick look at some CNC-related content I explored today.

üî• YouTube ‚Äì DIY CNC: Your Questions Answered (and What I‚Äôd Do Differently)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nlWXileUSbU

This is a follow-up to the first video about my DIY CNC router. Here I answer some of the frequently asked questions I received in the comments on that video. If you have any additional questions, let me know!

In question 5, I talk about the bits I like to use. My main choices are:

item.title: 2025-08-03 ‚Äì CNC Related

A quick look at some CNC-related content I explored today.

Discussion on RootCNC Discourse
https://rootcnc.discourse.group/t/overall-average-costs-for-complete-builds-ready-to-run/216

but here is a rough costing for the machines:
4 ~¬£1200 but mine is a considerably larger machine so saving can be made here!
4 Lite ¬£450-550
3 Lite ¬£450-530
3 Unsure its been a while
Root 2 is not recommended as the newer machine out perform it.

item.title: 2025-08-02 ‚Äì CNC Related
item.description:
A quick look at some interesting CNC-related content I explored today.

üì∫ YouTube ‚Äì OpenBuilds LEAD 1515 Electronics & Software (Using BlackBox)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xxyA5WftF8k

A detailed build video covering the OpenBuilds LEAD 1515, with a focus on electronics, wiring, and software setup using the BlackBox controller.
A solid reference if you‚Äôre planning a similar build or want to understand the workflow from assembly to operation.

item.title: 2025-07-29 ‚Äì CNC Related
item.description:
An overview of interesting CNC-related links I explored today.

üì∫ Youtube - The Ultimate OneFinity CNC Setup - Spoilboard, Cart, Vertical Table - 400

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dvur03ZA3vU

Create description on make a table, spoilboard and fence

üì∫ Youtube - Stainless OX CNC work surface and spoil board

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Inl28tvREKU

How I made the work surface and spoil board for my DIY Stainless OX CNC machine. Design in Sketchup and generation of G-code using CamBam and finally cutting the parts on the Stainless OX. For more info check: https://forum.makersupplies.dk/listin…

item.title: 2025-07-26 - CNC Related
item.description:
An overview of interesting links from today.

Website ‚Äì CNC Workflow Using CNCjs

https://makerhardware.net/knowledge-base/how-to-guides/cnc-workflow-using-cncjs/

A helpful tutorial on using CNCjs for engraving.

YouTube ‚Äì How to Build a Large CNC Router (Arduino GRBL + UGS)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DF_1bY8aJbc

A great build video showing how to create a large CNC router using an Arduino, GRBL, and Universal G-Code Sender (UGS).

Highlighted comment:

As somebody about to undertake building my own CNC router, this is the best video that breaks down the basic component design of the table. Mine will be different but this paints such a good picture for a starting point. Excellent work.

item.title: 2025-07-26 - MPCNC related
item.description:
An overview of interesting links from today.

Verkabelung und Steuerung der MPCNC: Eine Schritt-f√ºr-Schritt-Anleitung

https://konstruktionsbude.de/mpcnc-verkabelung-steuerung/

A German page detailing the control of an MPCNC using an Arduino-based setup.

Also additional information on the MPCNC:

item.title: 2025-07-25 - Rascal CNC
item.description:
While browsing the web for information about ROOT CNC, I came across an intriguing CNC design:

Rascal CNC

The Rascal CNC is a hobby grade CNC machine designed BY the Community FOR the Community with the simple goal of being able to cut foam board airplanes.

Here are just a few benefits of owning a Rascal.

Most capable machine for the cost (under $500 USD) For the cost you won’t find a better suited machine to cut foam board and lite ply on its 30x30" (76cm) cut bed.
